import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ProfileService } from '../profile.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-intro', templateUrl: './intro.component.html', styleUrls: ['./intro.component.scss'] }) export class IntroComponent implements OnInit { cvUrl: any constructor(private profileService:ProfileService) { } ngOnInit() { this.cvUrl = this.profileService.resumeurl } }
